message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it's a fantastic deal and will be very beneficial to you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price to meet my budget?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? This offer stands until the end of the day.

Hello Alice, thank you for your response. While I understand your position, I am still unable to meet the price of $17,000. Could you possibly lower it to $14,000? I believe this would be a fair compromise considering my budget.
